pkgmetadata.longdescription: Client for 'jq', a 'JSON' Processor // Client for 'jq', a 'JSON' processor (https://stedolan.github.io/jq/), written in C. 'jq' allows the following with 'JSON' data: index into, parse, do calculations, cut up and filter, change key names and values, perform conditionals and comparisons, and more.
